Articles.Content:
**Launch the main part of the station "Ultra".** 

The ring, with diameter of 85.7 meters + large liquid fuel boosters. All of them landed softly.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/INSDmxxTr-k?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Starting mass:** 3456 t

**Starting parts:** 681 

**Mass in the circular orbit (80 km):** 780 t

**Parts in orbit:** 295

**Full Stock. Manual control.**

**Music:** 

Edvard Grieg/Wolf Hoffman - In The Hall Of The Mountain King

[**<-PREV**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126619-Ultra-uprising) | **The next video in the comments to this post.**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-08T10:52:36Z" title="07/08/2015 10:52  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 8, 2015</time> by Child of Antares**
  
Adding a new episode.

Some people have asked me to show the process of construction of this station. So... Watch and listen.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XaNfTwIwaAE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Music:

Ludovico Einaudi - Oltremare

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T18:56:57Z" title="06/27/2015 06:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by Child of Antares**

**Update. Ultra refueling.**

Delivery to the station "Ultra" components the docking system and fuel, needed for ascent to keostationary.

Apart from the rather large size, it is the ordinary rocket. 4 booster connected asparagus (they raised the station and later parachuted) + central cargo unit, filled half the hundreds of tons of fuel, power plant (aka Solar Observatory), one large and two small drones + universal docking station.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/C11NkwK-vNs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Music:**

Mikhail Glinka - Ruslan and Ludmila Overture

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-08T10:48:10Z" title="07/08/2015 10:48  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 8, 2015</time> by Child of Antares**
